author: gawor
msg: Support X.509 signature and ecryption for service references with CXF. Based on patch from Rahul Mehta (GERONIMO-4642)

author: bentmann
msg: o Fixed verifier to start with a normalized local repo path

author: hindessm
msg: Try to avoid doing work in the case of a trivial build-native where no
files have changed.  Remove the overwrite="yes" which I think is only
needed when there is clock skew and set preservemodificationtime="true"
so that we avoid clock problems and avoid triggering make rules.

author: bentmann
msg: o Splitted plugin manager: One general component for any kind of Maven plugin, one specifically tailored for execution of build plugins. The generic plugin manager is meant to be reused by the new Site Plugin, the other plugin manager is private to the core.
